attributes.action: The government should be made to appear on news channels and news night
attributes.additional_details: The government avoid certain news channels that scrutinise their policies and actions and refuse to be answerable to the public.
attributes.background: The government avoid answering questions and being held to account by refusing to appear on news programmes. There should be a government spokes person available at all prime time news slots and not just the channels they select.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329807
